meme_buss.title: WE MEME BUSINESS!
meme_buss.description_even: Wall Street Memes brings you the long-awaited token for a vibrant community followed and engaged with by even Elon Musk.

wsm_token.title: $WSM TOKEN
wsm_token.content_1: The little guy challenged Wall Street in the infamous GameStop fiasco of 2021, and the legacy of those brave Wall Street Bets heroes endures until today.
wsm_token.content_2: Born out of that movement is Wall Street Memes - the ultimate expression of the internet‚Äôs triumph over rampant capitalism. ‚ÄúGreed is good,‚Äù said Gordon Gekko in the ‚Äò80s as he got rich off useless stocks. Around 30 years later, hundreds of arguably even more useless meme coins allow ordinary people to do the same.
wsm_token.content_3: Wall Street Memes is tokenising the movement. Join the $WSM army today and prove that greed is, indeed, very good.

wall_meme.title: HOW TO BUY WALL STREET MEMES TOKEN
wall_meme.subtitle: Take charge and buy $WSM tokens in presale using ETH, BNB, USDT, or bank card before it lists on DEX.
wall_meme.speech_1: Send ETH or BNB to your wallet and ape in using your preferred chain. Use the presale widget above to swap for $WSM.
wall_meme.speech_2: You can also buy $WSM tokens with USDT (ERC-20 or BEP-20). Use the USDT option and swap your desired amount.
wall_meme.speech_3: Prefer plastic? No problem. Have your own crypto wallet address on hand and order $WSM tokens using your bank card.
